title: How can a woman avoid free mixing when visiting family in joint family? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: now the questioner says that how should she manage if she visits her homeland where she has to live in a joint family for a month or two where there will be cousins and other nun muharram she shouldn't go simple as that she should either demand a separate accommodation which is not exposed to such an Mohammed or she shouldn't travel for from the very beginning
